title: MAKEUP CLASSES
content: Does anybody have any idea how makeup classes take place and can i recover from 60%

comments.body: You don't need classes, you can learn how to do makeup on YouTube.
I never attended them but you'll have them in the days after isa2 and before esa
can i make it up to 75 from 60?

Sorry I'm not really sure how it works but maybe.
Try asking your class coordinator once
